rivRmon

The goal of rivRmon is to provide tools to aid in data munging and visualisation of monitoring data from the Swan and Canning Rivers.

Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Bartesto/rivRmon")
library(rivRmon)

Help Files

All functions within rivRmon have the usual R help files, however the best place to see these and some vignettes is the rivRmon website
